subtitle.Text: Steve: This is where you find the first half of Sam's locker - or, I guess, this is actually the second half of Sam's locker combo, as far as what the piece of paper is.
But at first, there were... the locker combination sheet was torn into three pieces, so you had one digit on each of them, and it was actually right before we sent out our IGF build to the judges,
it was the night before, and Karla came down to the basement, and she was like, "At 3 o'clock in the morning last night, I woke up in bed just being like,
'Oh, we can't have it in three pieces! That's way too gamey! That's bad! We have to fix that!'"
Karla: I forgot about that! Steve: And you were absolutely right, and you've had a couple of those...
Karla: Yeah. Steve: ...being woken up by us making a bad decision, kind of moments, over the course of the development, and they were always important changes that needed to be made.
